message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. Given its immense value and quality, it's worth more than $15,000 to you. As the seller, I aim to maximize my earnings while ensuring you receive a fair deal. I propose to sell the product to you for $12,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing my profit and offering you a competitive advantage over other potential buyers. I believe this is an excellent opportunity for both of us.
